text:
Students of Anuvrat Vidhyalaya CBSE School and Rotary Club (Golden City Vellore) jointly organised a road safety awareness initiative at Pallikonda toll plaza on Tuesday.

S. Murugan, Pallikonda circle inspector, inaugurated the campaign by sticking bulls’ eyes stickers on the head lamps of vehicles plying through the toll plaza.

The students distributed hand bills to drivers with messages on road safety, a press release said. — Staff Reporter
title: Students organise road safety drive
